@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@

+</project>

@@ -1,12 +1,9 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <project version="4">

     <option name="state" value="project://e2804f05-5315-4fc6-a121-c522a6c26470" />

     <output url="file://$PROJECT_DIR$/out" />
   </component>
 </project>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -2,8 +2,7 @@

@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@

+    <mapping directory="$PROJECT_DIR$" vcs="Git" />

+</project>
